testcase.name: testHauntedCreeperWithFullBoardBoardClear

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: The size of the board is different than expected. Expected board: [Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1 ?, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1 ?, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1 ?, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1 ?, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1 ?, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1 ?, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1 ?]. Actual board: [Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1, Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1]

testcase.name: testHauntedCreeperWithFullBoard

Expected board: [Minion(Spectral Spider) 1/1 ?, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2 ?, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2 ?, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2 ?, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2 ?, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2 ?, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2 ?].
